text: This is a list of the main churches and monasteries in Albania. ==Churches== 765 churches and monasteries were destroyed by communist authorities in 1967 when state atheism was first introduced in the country.Si u shembën 2169 kisha e xhami {| class="wikitable sortable" |- | colspan="6" bgcolor="#e8debf" align=center|15px '''''' |- ! # !!
